SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
Attention: Assigned Payee/Beneficiary:
The content of your email is well noted.
It is also very important to know that the IMF is working alongside the
BIS, the Bank for International Settlements and central banks around the
world, as well as the newly assigned settlement in the United States
following  Section 326 of the USA PATRIOT Act to really improve domestic
and global cross‑border payments which requires that all financial
institutions or government-accredited fund transfer agencies must go
through the "Know Your Customer" (KYC) verification Process to ensure that
all verified and approved beneficiary's funds are safely released and
accessible in their designated account within three banking days following
international best practice.
This is the instruction given to the IMF from international bodies as an
extraordinary policy measure to ensure that all vetted beneficiaries secure
their unclaimed funds or interest of the accrued payment respectively.
Therefore you are required to kindly reconfirm below for verification and
final payment:
1) Your full name.
2) Contact Address
3) Phone, fax and mobile #.
4) Age.
5) Occupation.
6) Your bank details
Thank you very much for your patience and maximum co-operation.
Always keep me posted as soon as you hear back from the appointed payment
Bank.
Yours faithfully,
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund
IMF HQ2: 1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington, DC 20431, United States.

Attention: Assigned Payee/Beneficiary:
I appreciate your email.
Your information is simply required for verification and final payment.
Thank you very much for your patience and maximum co-operation.
Yours faithfully,
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund
IMF HQ2: 1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington, DC 20431, United States.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
conversations.body:
Attention: Assigned Payee/Beneficiary:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY AND YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THE REASON FOR THE PAYMENT.
This is to officially notify you that after our board meeting with United
Nations and United State Government including European Parliament and Asia
Government, the Independent Evaluation Office (IEO) of  the IMF has been
given an ultimatum for immediate release of all outstanding
contract/inheritance payments including government grants and compensations
benefits to the nominated beneficiaries who lost their moneys to scammers
of which you name appears as one of the victims to be compensated based on
IMF Global Financial Stability Report 2021 (GFSR).
It is also very important to know that the IMF is working alongside the
BIS, the Bank for International Settlements and central banks around the
world, as well as the newly assigned settlement in the United States
following  Section 326 of the USA PATRIOT Act to really improve domestic
and global cross‑border payments which requires that  requires all
financial institutions or government-accredited fund transfer agencies must
go through the "Know Your Customer" (KYC) verification Process to ensure
that all verified and approved beneficiary's funds are safely released and
accessible in their designated account within three banking days following
international best practice.
This is the instruction given to the IMF from international bodies as an
extraordinary policy measure to ensure that all vetted beneficiaries secure
their unclaimed funds or interest of the accrued payment respectively.
Therefore you are required to kindly reconfirm below for verification and
final payment:
1) Your full name.
2) Contact Address
3) Phone, fax and mobile #.
4) Age.
5) Occupation.
6) Your bank details
For more inquiry contact my private email  vipfinanaceace@gmail.com or
 Phone: +1 ( 639 391 7489 (SMS enabled).
Thank you very much for your patience and maximum co-operation.
Yours faithfully,
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund
IMF HQ2: 1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington, DC 20431, United States.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
conversations.body:
Hello, thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please clarify which specific contract payment or government grant I am eligible for? Also, can you provide more information on the Know Your Customer KYC process and how it ensures the safety of my funds? I am hesitant to provide my personal information and bank details without fully understanding the process. Thank you.
Best wishes,
Dolores

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
conversations.body:
Re. Due Process of your Compensation Benefits valued 1,485,000.00 USD.
Dear Beneficiary,
Thanks for your email and to answer your question, This particular payment
is a compensation benefit to the nominated beneficiaries who lost their
money to scammers of which your name appears as one of the victims to be
compensated based on the IMF Global Financial Stability Report 2021 (GFSR).
As per the KYC, The Bank will serve you the form to  enable you fill and
sign for final transfer of funds to your designated Bank account.
Interestingly, every transfer arrangement has been officially concluded
with our accredited payment Center to immediately facilitate your payment
accordingly.
However, be further advised that payment instruction has been officially
communicated to our accredited bank (BNL Trust Financial Services),to
effect your payment through the electronic payment system as soon as they
finalize the mandatory KYC Verification Due Process exercise.
Therefore, you are required to contact the paying bank with the following
details, please quickly reconfirm your full personal information alongside
your Photo ID or International Passport to enable the financial institution
commence immediate processing of your funds transfer without further delay.
CONTACT DETAILS OF OUR ACCREDITED BANK BELOW:
REFERENCE NUMBER: 00564/ZQ2022
Peter Chu Ming, Client Services
BNL Trust Financial Services
Email: info@bnltrust.com
Please give them maximum cooperation needed to ensure immediate conclusion
of the transfer without possible complications.
Also endeavor to keep me posted with every meaningful development till your
funds are safely transferred into your designated bank account.
Please acknowledge my attached official ID as evidence of my official
mandate and capacity coordinator of your approved payment.
For more inquiry, please feel free to contact us and please keep
transactions confidential to avoid payment to the wrong persons.
Thank you for your anticipated cooperation.
Congratulations!
Yours faithfully,
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund
IMF HQ2: 1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington, DC 20431, United States.
Email: kristalina.georgieva@kg-imf.org

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
conversations.body:
Dear Peter Chu Ming,
Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information about the payment. I appreciate your efforts to help victims of scams recover their lost funds.
I understand that I need to fill out a KYC form and provide my personal information and photo ID or passport to the paying bank, BNL Trust Financial Services, in order to receive the transfer of funds. Can you please provide me with more information about the KYC Due Process exercise and what it entails?
Also, can you confirm that my personal information will be kept confidential and secure throughout the process? I want to ensure that my information is not compromised in any way.
Thank you for your assistance and I will keep you updated on the progress of the transfer.
Best wishes,
Dolores

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re: In response to your message, I
conversations.body:
Re. Due Process of your Compensation Benefits valued 1,485,000.00 USD.
Dear Beneficiary,
I appreciate your email and I am very sorry for the late reply to your
email.
However I honestly appreciate your skepticism towards this noble
transaction especially considering the overwhelming fraudulent activities
globally. Of course, your disposition is equally a reflection of
transparency and sincerity as a nobleman of grace.
* To answer your number one question' *Can you please provide me with more
information about the process and how I can access my benefits? *
1. As soon as you contact the paying Bank, They will open an online account
for you and from your online account, you will be able to access your funds
and also transfer your funds bit by bit to your designated bank account.
* To answer your number 2 question *Also, can you confirm the legitimacy of
the bank and the financial person you mentioned?*
2. You can rest assured that the Bank is 100% Legitimate and they are
aready texted and Okay.
Go ahead with the Bank because I am standing by you Okay?
Thank you for your anticipated cooperation.
Yours faithfully,
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund
IMF HQ2: 1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW,
Washington, DC 20431, United States.
Email: kristalina.georgieva@kg-imf.org
